properties.Name: PolicyholderConfirmationMethod
properties.Description: The primary and secondary confirmation method(s) for delivery of documentation and important information to the Policyholder.

Columns.Name: PolicyholderId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Policyholder.

Columns.Name: ConfirmationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Confirmation Method.

Columns.Name: PrimaryConfirmationMethodIndicator
Columns.Description: An indicator denoting that the associated Confirmation Method is the primary confirmation method for insurance offerings, adjustments or terminations is conveyed to the Policyholder.

Columns.Name: AlternateConfirmationMethodIndicator
Columns.Description: An indicator denoting that the associated Confirmation Method is the alternate confirmation method for insurance offerings, adjustments or terminations is conveyed to the Policyholder.

Columns.Name: DocumentationConfirmationMethodIndicator
Columns.Description: An indicator denoting that the associated Confirmation Method is the confirmation method for issuance of important documentation related to the Policy.

Columns.Name: ReferencesConfirmationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Confirmation Method.
